text: Sir Albert Thomas "Archie" Lamb KBE CMG DFC (23 October 1921 â€“ 19 October 2021) was a British politician, writer and RAF fighter pilot. He was the British ambassador to Kuwait from 1974 to 1977, and to Norway from 1978 to 1980. Lamb was born in Swansea, Wales. Lamb was appointed MBE in 1953.The London Gazette, 26 May 1953 Lamb died on 19 October 2021, four days before his 100th birthday.Lamb ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British aviators Category:Welsh writers Category:Ambassadors of the United Kingdom Category:People from Swansea
title: Archie Lamb
